snippet: The hugely popular drama became the biggest hit of the fall television season on Sunday night, with the premiere of its third season posting ratings that placed it at the top of all dramas in the history of basic cable television.
abstract: The hugely popular drama became the biggest hit of the fall television season on Sunday night, with the premiere of its third season posting ratings that placed it at the top of all dramas in the history of basic cable television.

headline.main: 'Walking Dead' Sets Ratings Record on AMC
headline.print_headline: ‘The Walking Dead’ Struts in Season Premiere
